Title: MobSoft
Description: MobSoft is  silverlight based news related application designed to test the new functionalitities in Silverlight 4
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MobSoft is silverlight based news related application designed to test the new functionalitities in Silverlight 4

In this project i am experimenting with Silverlight controls and WCF Services. I will also be playing with 3rd party control to experience the power and performance of silverlight and judge its potential for serious projects.
